title: Cant change password
body: When i go to logg in it says i need to change pw, but when i type old and new pws in it gives me an error

replies.body:
Does this [password reset](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/change-password/na/en-us) link work for you? 

If not, try [this link](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-password) instead. Let me know if either worked!
